general.gigTitle: design and develop a pro responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.description: I am a web developer . I have 4 years of experience in web development using Php (codeigniter MVC ,HMVC) , wordpress and shopify. I am elementor pro expert and can convert designs to wordpress website.

description.content:
About This Gig

Delivering affordable high-converting, fast and bespoke websites.


Hello there, My name is Sajeel Baig, a Senior Web Developer .

I have experience with a large range of projects in Wordpress, including business website, blog, e-commerce, agency, directory listing, job portal, real estate and many more. I work with a focus on Standard, Quality, and Professionalism to deliver the right product for your business.


Gig Key Features:

Client satisfaction

Highly professional and responsive wordpress website for all devices

Unique design

SEO and Mobile friendly structure

Speed optimized

Optimized image slider, Popup and CTAs for high-conversion

Email Marketing Platforms connection (Mailchimp)

Social Media Platforms integration

Easy to edit Page Builder

Elementor and other Page Builder support

Customized design

E-commerce with various payment integrations

Premium Design

FREE Premium images and graphics

Secured and user-friendly admin panel

Social media integration

Live chat integration

Mailchimp or other mailing lists integrations

Content upload

Excellent Support for My Client


Guarantee

Fully secured Fast loading pages

packageList.title: Basic WordPress Website
packageList.description: Up to 3 Pages responsive website with animated slider, 4 Sections, Contact form, Social Media l

packageList.title: Standard WordPress Website
packageList.description: Outstanding website 3-5 informational pages, Social Media integration, Map, Secure panel.

packageList.title: Ecommerce Mobile Friendly Website
packageList.description: Up to 10 pages E-Commerce with shopping cart (WooCommerce), Secure.

reviews.comment:
Sajeel is so fast and professional. I enjoyed so much the experience with him.
Working with him was so easy and he did his best !
Would totally recommend to my friends and family.
Thank you Sajeel !
Super helpful, it took quite a while (because of me) to go over all the things I wanted to change on the website. He was always very patient and helped me make a beautiful site for my non profit.

seller_response.comment: thanks alot for your order and trust

reviews.comment: I wholeheartedly recommend you for my project.Your exceptional work, professionalism, and dedication to my satisfaction make them a standout choice in the field. I'm incredibly pleased with the results, and I look forward to working with you again in the future. Thank you for a job well done!
Sajeel was very prompt and receptive with his communication.  Very happy with the job.  Explained to a relative novice the steps in website design.
